activity_summary.category_suicide_message: Critical Level: Parent indicated possible bullying. Bring to immediate attention of clinician due to potential emergency situation.
activity_summary.category_emotional_message: Within normal limits: No further screening or assessment required.
activity_summary.category_sport_message: Clinical Range: Make clinician aware; Perform follow up assessment (Recommended); Generate referral.

about_app.mindlogger_about:
### What is MindLogger?

This app is part of the open source MindLogger data collection and analysis platform designed by the MATTER Lab at the Child Mind Institute (https://matter.childmind.org).

### What can MindLogger do?

MindLogger's feature set is growing, and currently supports a wide variety of input types. Each screen in a MindLogger activity can include any of the following:
  - Text, picture, and audio
  - Question followed by image and/or text response options
  - Slider bar
  - Text entry
  - Table entry
  - Audio record
  - Photo/video capture
  - Drawing or tapping
  - Current geolocation
  - Simple cognitive task
  - Delay before response
  - Timer
  - Conditional logic to determine where to go next

### Where can I learn more?

Please visit https://mindlogger.org for more information.

Cheers,
MindLogger Team
Child Mind Institute

join_invite.click_below: Click below if you are ready to join this study. You can remove yourself from this study and/or delete your data at any time with no consequences.
join_invite.decline: If you do not feel comfortable with sharing your data from this study, you may decline this invitation.

applet_settings.want_remove: If you want to remove this applet, but keep your data, click below
applet_settings.want_delete: If you want to delete your data from this applet and remove it, click below.

cloud server, and to access this information for clinical and research purposes

this app for clinical or research purposes.
